name: Barkerville
description:
Made for the GiantBomb gamejam, this was inspired by a playthrough of Simon's Quest, wherein Brad mentioned he always called the "Bloody Tears" theme Barkerville. "It's where the werewolves live," he explained.

In this game, you alternate between human & werewolf forms, using the different abilities of both to rescue your fellow Barkerville werewolves. Can you save them all? How fast can you do so?
